alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 9:52PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT IBERIA...NORTHWESTERN ST. MARY... SOUTHEASTERN VERMILION AND CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 1045 PM CST... At 951 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Lake Fausse Pointe to near Intracoastal City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Franklin, Jeanerette, Cypremort Point, Avery Island, Intracoastal City, Baldwin, Loreauville, Glencoe, Lydia, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island, Lake Fausse Pointe, Charenton, Pierre Part, Weeks Island, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
